BackgroundFetchRecord.summary: NOTE Experimental The BackgroundFetchRecord interface of the represents an individual request and response.

remarks.para: A BackgroundFetchRecord is created by the method, therefore there is no constructor for this interface.
There will be one BackgroundFetchRecord for each resource requested by fetch().

BackgroundFetchRecordResponseReady.summary: NOTE Experimental The responseReady read-only property of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with a .

BackgroundFetchRecordRequest.summary: NOTE Experimental The request read-only property of the interface returns the details of the resource to be fetched.
